'''0.0.22a'''<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:21:52 <Rroff> before on just plain 22a sound was fine for me''". (22:21:52 UTC)</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 29, 2009, at 21:56 UTC, which added sounds and music by [[C418]].<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:56:47 <akuryo> notch you did an update?''", "''P4:56:55 <AlLnAtuRalX> Notch, server update?''". (21:56 UTC)</ref>

0.0.22a was reuploaded at 21:58 UTC (2 minutes after release) to fix players not being able to connect to servers.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:58:33 <08Notch> there we go, the client should work again''". (21:58:33 UTC)</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
<!-- {{cd|.ogg}} vorbis multiple sounds for blocks.{{more info needed|type=untestable}} -->
'''[[Sound]]s'''<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:58:39 <08Notch> yeah, this is very basic sound''". (21:58:39 UTC)</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:59:46 <akuryo> SOUND IS HERE''" (21:59:46 UTC)</ref>
* Grass, gravel, stone, and wood sounds. Used as footsteps and breaking sounds.<ref name="footstep">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:59:07 <C418> I actually really love the destroying sound being footsteps''". (21:59:07 UTC)</ref>
** Grass sounds were used for [[dirt]], [[leaves]], [[sponge]], [[cloth]].<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:01:06 <AlLnAtuRalX> the footsteps on cloth / grass one''" (22:01:06 UTC)</ref>
** Gravel sounds were used for [[sand]], [[gravel]].
** Stone sounds were used for [[stone]], [[cobblestone]], [[gold ore]], [[iron ore]], [[coal ore]]. High pitched stone sounds were used for [[glass]], [[block of gold]].<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:58:59 <AlLnAtuRalX> I love the walk on glass sound''". (21:58:59 UTC)</ref>
** Wood sounds were used for [[planks]], [[log|wood]].
*** Added unused wood <code>click.ogg</code> sound.

'''[[Music]]'''
* Added [[music]] by [[C418]]: {{cd|d=,|calm1.ogg|calm2.ogg|calm3.ogg|calm4.ogg}} (duplicate of <code>calm2.ogg</code>)<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:00:04 <AlLnAtuRalX> I hear music?''" [...] "''P5:00:59 <Quatroking> what the hell is this music''" [...] "''P5:03:36 <Lmaoboat> Lol, I heared the music after a while without it, and I was about to yell at my brother for playing the piano again''" (22:00:04 to 22:03:36 UTC)</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:01:51 <C418> I should have made hard techno''" [...] "''P5:46:34 <08Notch> no, C418 did the music''" (22:01:51 & 22:46:34 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE5.png|32px]].
** It now appears brighter overall.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:05:14 <Fishlips> thank you so much for making lava look a thousand times better!''" [...] "''P5:08:36 <Evil-Ville> ah you made lava brighter''" [...] "''P5:10:35 <Fishlips> lava has been changed''" [...] "''P5:10:39 <Quatroking> Yep''" [...] "''P5:10:46 <Quatroking> just checked the pic on the wiki and this one is brighter''" [...] "''P5:10:58 <AlLnAtuRalX> New lava owns''" (22:05:14 to 22:10:58 UTC)</ref>

== Technical ==
=== General ===
* Replaced the FPS meter with a frame-rate limiter.<ref name="fps limit">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:06:14 <08Notch> i took out the fps meter''" [...] ''P5:06:18 <08Notch> and added a framerate limiter''". (22:06 UTC)</ref>
** FPS is now limited to 200.

== Removals ==
* FPS no longer displays on the screen.{{verify}}

== Bugs ==
'''4 bugs reported'''
* Pre-reupload: Players can no longer connect to servers.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:56:42 <akuryo> I CAN NOT CONNECT ON ANY SERVER''". (21:56:42 UTC)</ref>
* Sounds are very laggy and choppy in this version for some users.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:58:34 <AlLnAtuRalX> my sound lags also''" [...] "''P5:00:37 <AlLnAtuRalX> like a millisecond of sound, a millisecond without''" (21:58:34 & 22:00:37 UTC)</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:00:34 <vdgmprgrmr> It's extremely choppy.''" [...] "''P5:00:51 <vdgmprgrmr> I can't even tell what the sound is supposed to be it's so choppy.''" (22:00 UTC)</ref>
* Walking sounds continue for a while after the player stops moving.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P5:01:51 <vdgmprgrmr> My walking sounds keep going for about a minute after I stop walking.''". (22:01:51 UTC)</ref>
* Breaking a plant in darkness no longer produces particles.{{verify|type=untestable}}
